message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start
Your initial offer wasn't unreasonable, but I think an even split is the fairest way to go.
I see you want an even split, but I think I can do a bit better than that. Meet me in the middle of our previous offers?
Okay, let's be practical. I'm willing to compromise a bit more. This offer is closer to the middle ground.
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Let's try this compromise.
This is my final offer. I'm willing to accept a slightly smaller share to get this done. It's important we both get something!
You said that was your final offer, but I'm willing to take a smaller step down to try and reach a deal. Don't let us both walk away with nothing.
